pageContext.claim: “I've taken better care of Puerto Rico than any man ever. We have $91 billion going to Puerto Rico. We have $29 billion to Texas and $12 billion to Florida for the hurricanes. Puerto Rico has been taken care of better by Donald Trump than by any living human being.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's $91 billion figure is a long-term (20-year) estimate for the potential liabilities under the law for Puerto Rico's rebuilding costs in the wake of Hurricane Maria. It is subject to change, but he suggests it has already been committed.
